DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id, a.bnft_admin_sys_id, c.admin_lvl_nm,c.ADMIN_LVL_SYS_ID, b.admin_opt_desc_txt, b.admin_opt_sys_id, d.blvl_bnft_lvl_desc, d.blvl_bnft_lvl_id, a.admin_lvl_sys_id from bnft_admin_to_lvl_assn a, admin_opt_mstr b, badl_admn_lvl c, blvl_bnft_lvl d where a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = ? and c.admin_lvl_sys_id = a.admin_lvl_sys_id and b.admin_opt_sys_id = a.admin_opt_sys_id and a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = d.blvl_bnft_lvl_id (+) and a.DEL_FLAG = 'N'

select a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id, a.bnft_admin_sys_id, b.admin_opt_rfrnc_id, b.admin_opt_desc_txt, d.admin_lvl_nm, c.blvl_bnft_lvl_desc, c.blvl_bnft_lvl_id,a.SQNC_NBR,a.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID,a.ADMIN_LVL_SYS_ID from bnft_admin_to_lvl_assn a , admin_opt_mstr b, blvl_bnft_lvl c, badl_admn_lvl d where a.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} and a.BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID = {1} and b.admin_opt_sys_id = a.admin_opt_sys_id and d.admin_lvl_sys_id = a.admin_lvl_sys_id and a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = c.blvl_bnft_lvl_id(+) and a.DEL_FLAG = 'N' order by a.SQNC_NBR

select distinct a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id, a.bnft_admin_sys_id, b.admin_opt_rfrnc_id, b.admin_opt_desc_txt, d.admin_lvl_nm, c.blvl_bnft_lvl_desc, c.blvl_bnft_lvl_id, a.SQNC_NBR,a.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID,a.ADMIN_LVL_SYS_ID,e.ADMIN_OPTION_HIDE_FLAG from bnft_admin_to_lvl_assn a , admin_opt_mstr b, blvl_bnft_lvl c, badl_admn_lvl d, ANSWR_OVRD_INFO e where a.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} and b.admin_opt_sys_id = a.admin_opt_sys_id and d.admin_lvl_sys_id = a.admin_lvl_sys_id and a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = c.blvl_bnft_lvl_id(+) and a.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = e.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID and e.ENTY_TYPE = {1} and e.ENTY_SYS_ID = {2} and e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {3} and a.DEL_FLAG = 'N' order by a.SQNC_NBR

select A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR,A.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID,A.SQNC_NBR,C.PSBL_ANSWR_ID,C.PSBL_ANSWR,A.PRMRY_CD from ADMIN_OPT_TO_QSTN_ASSN A , PSBL_ANSWR C where A.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID ={0} and A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = C.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR order by A.SQNC_NBR, C.PSBL_ANSWR_ID
select ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID, ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID from BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN where BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID = {0} and ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = {1} and ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID not in {2} and DEL_FLAG = 'N'

select A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR,B.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID from BNFT_ADMIN_OPT_QSTN_ASSN A, BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN B where A.ADQM_ADMN_QSTN_NBR = {0} and A.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID(+) = B.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID and B.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = {1}
SELECT BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID,MAX(SQNC_NBR)+1 FROM BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN WHERE BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID = {0} and DEL_FLAG = 'N' GROUP BY BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: INSERT INTO BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN ( ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID, ADMIN_LVL_SYS_ID, ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID, BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID , LST_CHG_USR, LST_CHG_TMS, CREATD_USER_ID, CREATD_TM_STMP,SQNC_NBR,BNFT_DEFN_SYS_ID, DEL_FLAG) VALUES(?, ?, ?, ?, decode (?, 0,NULL,?), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?,?, 'N')
UPDATE BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN SET DEL_FLAG = 'Y', LST_CHG_TMS = SYSDATE WHERE ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = ?

update BNFT_ADMIN_TO_LVL_ASSN set ADMIN_LVL_SYS_ID = ?,ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID = ?,BNFT_ADMIN_SYS_ID = ?, BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = decode (?, 0,NULL,?),LST_CHG_USR = ?,LST_CHG_TMS = ?,SQNC_NBR =? where ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID =?
delete from note_domain_ovrd_val where prmry_enty_id=? and prmry_enty_type='ATTACHBENEFIT' and scndry_enty_type='ATTACHQUESTION' and scndry_enty_id=?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select distinct a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id, a.bnft_admin_sys_id, b.admin_opt_rfrnc_id, b.admin_opt_desc_txt, d.admin_lvl_nm, c.blvl_bnft_lvl_desc,c.blvl_bnft_lvl_id,a.SQNC_NBR,a.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, a.ADMIN_LVL_SYS_ID, e.ADMIN_OPTION_HIDE_FLAG from bnft_admin_to_lvl_assn a , admin_opt_mstr b, blvl_bnft_lvl c, badl_admn_lvl d,BNFT_CMPNT_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM e where a.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} and e.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = a.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID and b.admin_opt_sys_id = a.admin_opt_sys_id and d.admin_lvl_sys_id = a.admin_lvl_sys_id and a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = c.blvl_bnft_lvl_id(+) and a.ADMIN_LVL_SYS_ID =2 and e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID ={1} union select distinct a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id, a.bnft_admin_sys_id, b.admin_opt_rfrnc_id, b.admin_opt_desc_txt, d.admin_lvl_nm, c.blvl_bnft_lvl_desc,c.blvl_bnft_lvl_id,a.SQNC_NBR,a.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID, a.ADMIN_LVL_SYS_ID, e.ADMIN_OPTION_HIDE_FLAG from bnft_admin_to_lvl_assn a , admin_opt_mstr b, blvl_bnft_lvl c, badl_admn_lvl d,BNFT_CMPNT_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM e where a.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} and e.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = a.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID and b.admin_opt_sys_id = a.admin_opt_sys_id and d.admin_lvl_sys_id = a.admin_lvl_sys_id and a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = c.blvl_bnft_lvl_id(+) and a.ADMIN_LVL_SYS_ID=1 and e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {1} and a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID in (select BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID from BNFT_CMPNT_BNFT_CSTMZD where BNFT_LVL_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' and BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {2}) order by SQNC_NBR

select distinct a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id, a.bnft_admin_sys_id, b.admin_opt_rfrnc_id, b.admin_opt_desc_txt, d.admin_lvl_nm, c.blvl_bnft_lvl_desc, c.blvl_bnft_lvl_id, a.SQNC_NBR,a.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID,a.ADMIN_LVL_SYS_ID,e.ADMIN_OPTION_HIDE_FLAG from bnft_admin_to_lvl_assn a , admin_opt_mstr b, blvl_bnft_lvl c, badl_admn_lvl d, PROD_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM e where a.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} and b.admin_opt_sys_id = a.admin_opt_sys_id and d.admin_lvl_sys_id = a.admin_lvl_sys_id and a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = c.blvl_bnft_lvl_id(+) and a.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = e.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID and e.PROD_SYS_ID = {1} and e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {2} and e.ADMIN_OPTION_HIDE_FLAG = 'F' order by a.SQNC_NBR

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: update BNFT_CMPNT_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM set ADMIN_OPTION_HIDE_FLAG = ? , LST_CHG_USR = ? , LST_CHG_TMS = ? where BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ? and ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = ?

DataSource.name: prmd
DataSource.SelectSQLQuery: select a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id, a.bnft_admin_sys_id, c.admin_lvl_nm,c.ADMIN_LVL_SYS_ID, b.admin_opt_desc_txt, b.admin_opt_sys_id, d.blvl_bnft_lvl_desc, d.blvl_bnft_lvl_id, a.admin_lvl_sys_id from bnft_admin_to_lvl_assn a, admin_opt_mstr b, badl_admn_lvl c, blvl_bnft_lvl d where a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id = ? and c.admin_lvl_sys_id = a.admin_lvl_sys_id and b.admin_opt_sys_id = a.admin_opt_sys_id and a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = d.blvl_bnft_lvl_id (+)

select distinct a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id, a.bnft_admin_sys_id, b.admin_opt_rfrnc_id, b.admin_opt_desc_txt, d.admin_lvl_nm, c.blvl_bnft_lvl_desc, c.blvl_bnft_lvl_id, a.SQNC_NBR,a.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID,a.ADMIN_LVL_SYS_ID,e.ADMIN_OPTION_HIDE_FLAG from bnft_admin_to_lvl_assn a , admin_opt_mstr b, blvl_bnft_lvl c, badl_admn_lvl d, PROD_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM e where a.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} and b.admin_opt_sys_id = a.admin_opt_sys_id and d.admin_lvl_sys_id = a.admin_lvl_sys_id and a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = c.blvl_bnft_lvl_id(+) and a.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = e.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID and e.PROD_SYS_ID = {1} and e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {2} order by a.SQNC_NBR

select distinct a.admin_lvl_opt_assn_sys_id, a.bnft_admin_sys_id, b.admin_opt_rfrnc_id, b.admin_opt_desc_txt, d.admin_lvl_nm, c.blvl_bnft_lvl_desc, c.blvl_bnft_lvl_id, a.SQNC_NBR,a.ADMIN_OPT_SYS_ID,a.ADMIN_LVL_SYS_ID,e.ADMIN_OPTION_HIDE_FLAG from bnft_admin_to_lvl_assn a , admin_opt_mstr b, blvl_bnft_lvl c, badl_admn_lvl d, PROD_STRCTR_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM e where a.bnft_admin_sys_id = {0} and b.admin_opt_sys_id = a.admin_opt_sys_id and d.admin_lvl_sys_id = a.admin_lvl_sys_id and a.BLVL_BNFT_LVL_ID = c.blvl_bnft_lvl_id(+) and a.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = e.ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID and e.PROD_STRCTR_SYS_ID = {1} and e.BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = {2} order by a.SQNC_NBR

SQLTemplate.SQLQuery: UPDATE PROD_ADMN_OPT_CUSTM SET ADMIN_OPTION_HIDE_FLAG = ?,LST_CHG_USR=?,LST_CHG_TMS=? WHERE PROD_SYS_ID = ? AND BNFT_CMPNT_SYS_ID = ? and ADMIN_LVL_OPT_ASSN_SYS_ID = ?
